reviews.review_msg: New prof but knows her stuff well. Ask her doubts and she will clear them well. FOLLOW THE RUBRIC. Do not use your own mind. Follow the exact things the rubric asks for.

Kelli does a very good job explaining the assignments and preparing students to succeed in the class. Provides very detailed feedback which helps you improve on future submissions. Final report group project: memo, risk analysis, SWOT, etc. Online discussions and in-class small assignments help provide easy marks to students. Overall, easy going.
